publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-3151 John Scott: Ayr Flower Show 2005—That the Parliament congratulates the Ayrshire Horticultural Society and its Chairman, Mr John Walker, on the success of the Ayr Flower Show, now in its 45th year, which ran from 5 to 7 August 2005; recognises the hard work and dedication of the 300 volunteers who helped ensure that the event went ahead this year; notes that almost 28,000 visitors attended the show, and hopes that the event will long continue to enjoy its status as one of Scotland’s premier flower shows.
S2M-3151 Ayr Flower Show 2005 (lodged on 11 August 2005) Phil Gallie*, Christine Grahame*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-3151 Ayr Flower Show 2005 (lodged on 11 August 2005) Mr Brian Monteith*
